EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #6.2019 Dealer Update #6
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - December 21, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | December 2018
GoDirect Router
- Updated pricing for this router that boasts a small size, low weight and many advanced features. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-21 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-21%20GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft_Rev A.pdf]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
CNX-900 Cabin Network Accelerator
- The CNX-900 provides unparalleled capabilities and its highly integrated functionality saves significant weight, installation time and maintenance costs. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-22 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-22 CNX-900 Cabin Network Accelerator for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
MCS-7100 (HD-710) Series Satcom System
- Upgrading to Inmarsat SwiftBroadband (SBB) provides passengers a means to “stay connected” in an ever-connected world. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-23 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-23 MCS-7100 %28HD-710%29 Series Satcom System for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
